name: Celtic Kings: Rage of War
notes: Music doesn't work but other sounds are ok.

files.installer: N/A Select the installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- installer: N/A Select the installer provided by GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Celtic Kings/Celtic kings.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing...
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
